name: EverTurtle
description:
This is our game for Project Context II called "Everturtle".

The EverTurtle is both animal and island and people live on it in our game. However due to pollution it is suffering and both it and the home of the people on it, is threathened. You play as a little girl trying to make a change and have to convince the other villagers to take action and change the way they deal with the pollution.

Controls
WASD to walk, SPACEBAR to jump, E to interact.

Credits
Programming: Joey Docter
Narrative Design: Kyra Kohne
Game Design: Sean Giesselink
Environment Research: Danielle van Aaken
2D (intro) Art: Kyra Kohne
3D Character Art : Jurre de Groot
3D Environment Art: Shanice de Jong, Jurre de Groot
Game Audio Design:  Joost Diederen
Video Editing: Jurre de Groot, Joost Diederen
